Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the letter by stating that Democratic senators asked the prosecutor in Ukraine to "investigate Trump," when in fact the letter requested information on why the prosecutor was prohibited from issuing subpoenas and interviewing witnesses in investigations related to Paul Manafort.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that Democratic senators sent a letter asking the prosecutor in Ukraine to investigate Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the letter from Democratic senators is evidence of improper behavior by Trump, when in fact it was focused on investigations related to Paul Manafort and did not involve Trump directly.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the letter was addressing concerns about the blocking of investigations into Paul Manafort and his connections to Ukraine, rather than being a direct request to investigate Trump.
